article_title: Jury Indicts Rochester, N.Y., Man for Allegedly Plotting Terror Attack
article_text:
A federal grand jury has indicted a Rochester, N.Y., man for allegedly plotting to carry out a terror attack because he sympathized with Islamic State militants, officials said Tuesday.

Mufid Elfgeeh, 30 years old, was arrested in June on gun charges that were the first step of a broader undercover operation by the Federal Bureau of Investigation.

On Tuesday, authorities announced he had been indicted on a charge of allegedly...
